mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.AllowedInSelfException
mdException.label: Allowed In Self Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a GeoHierarchy is added to itself as a parent/child.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.ConfirmDeleteHierarchyException
mdException.label: Confirm delete hierarchy exception
mdException.description: Exception thrown when deleting a GeoHierarchy with more than one parent.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.ConfirmHierarchyParentChangeException
mdException.label: Confirmation Hierarhcy Parent Change Exception
mdException.description: Exception thrown to confirm a GeoHierarchy parent change

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.geo.DuplicateHierarchyParentException
mdException.label: Duplicate Hierarchy Parent Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a child GeoHierarchy is added to the same parent twice

mdMethod.name: searchByEntityName
mdMethod.label: Search By Entity Name
mdMethod.description: Returns a list of GeoEntityViews that match the search criteria.

mdMethod.name: confirmChangeParent
mdMethod.label: Confirm Change Parent
mdMethod.description: Throws an exception with confirmation information to change a geo hierarchy's parent.

mdParameter.name: parentId
mdParameter.label: Parent Id
mdParameter.description: The id of the current GeoHierarchy parent.

mdMethod.name: confirmDeleteHierarchy
mdMethod.label: Confirm Delete Entity
mdMethod.description: Throws exception with confirmation information to delete a GeoHierarchy with more than one parent.

mdParameter.name: parentId
mdParameter.label: Parent Id
mdParameter.description: The id of the current GeoHierarchy parent.

mdMethod.name: deleteRelationship
mdMethod.label: Delete Relationship
mdMethod.description: Deletes the AllowedIn relationship with the given parent.

mdMethod.name: getOrderedChildren
mdMethod.label: Get Ordered Child Entities
mdMethod.description: Gets LocatedIn children ordered by label.

mdParameter.name: typeFilter
mdParameter.label: Type Filter
mdParameter.description: Name of GeoEntity subclass to filter.

mdMethod.name: deleteRelationship
mdMethod.label: Delete Relationship
mdMethod.description: Deletes the LocatedIn relationship with the given parent.

mdMethod.name: collectAllLocatedIn
mdMethod.label: Collect All Located In
mdMethod.description: Recursively collects all located in relationships.

mdParameter.name: typeFilter
mdParameter.label: Type Filter
mdParameter.description: Name of GeoEntity subclass to filter.
